title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at ACT in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: 4-5 hour experience interviewing with different groups and individuals including the hiring vice president, director and members of the team in which you would be working.  The interview starts with an initial overview with Talent Strategy.
Interview Questions: Situation based questions like, "describe a time you interacted with a difficult employee and how you handled the situation"
